allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$(cat <<''EOF''
Critical data accuracy validation - discovered major issues

- CRITICAL: Thoroughbred Ford scraping wrong VINs (Mercedes/GM not Ford) 
- CRITICAL: Suntrup Ford West broken pricing ($500-$4K for Broncos)
- Auffenberg Hyundai has syntax errors preventing execution
- Pappas Toyota times out (likely protected)
- Only Suntrup Ford Kirkwood validated as accurate ($77K F-150, $29K-$31K Mavericks)

Created validation scripts:
- verify_thoroughbred_vins.py: Decodes VINs to check manufacturers
- debug_suntrup_ford_west_data.py: Analyzes pricing accuracy
- Various test scripts for data validation

Major finding: Many ''working'' scrapers have fundamental data accuracy issues that must be fixed before applying on-lot methodology.

)")
